overview: In the 1880's a ruthess gang of outlaws terroized the Southwest.  These renegades were led by the notorious Bloody Jack Ryker and his top gun, Johnny Vermillion.  Three men stood in their way.  Stormy Lane and his two sidekicks, Cimarron Simmons and Texas Clapsaddle with the help of young Billy Wood pursue this band of cutthroats through the badlands of Texas.
tagline: Evil came to the Southwest until three blazing guns stood in the way.
title: Guns Along The Bravo
